subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- At least 146 German police officers are injured, 25 of them seriously, in clashes with about 2,000 protestors ahead of Group of Eight summit in Rostock, Germany, police spokesman says.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

The CNN Presidential Debates: Tomorrow at 7 p.m. ET, the
Democrats debate and for the first time take questions from the
voters.  Immediately after the debate, join the best political
team on television live for "Raw Politics." The Republicans
debate Tuesday at 7 p.m. ET. http://www.CNN.com/elections
